name: The Priestess They Needed (Demo)
description:
Story 

Life was not always kind to Briar. Some would even say it was downright unfair. Orphan from a young age, they had to fight to earn a place in the world. To this day, greater forces are trying to push them out, but finally, someone somewhere listened. Someone finally sees them for who they are. The next Oracle. 

A coveted position usually inaccessible to people like Briar, but who could oppose when the order comes from the highest power there is. What is seen by some as the coming of the end times might be the opportunity for Briar to show that although they may not be who the people want, they are what this world needs. 

 

Features 

-Turn-based combat 

-Hand drawn portraits and art 

-Open world, letting you tackle quests in whichever order 

-No grind required 

-Intricate story and world building 

- 1-2hrs of gameplay 

 

Credit

Plugins from Visustella 

Iconset from Caz
